summary: Completed testing of SQL X-Ray Enterprise v2.1.0 Robust Edition. Successfully verified new incremental scanner and workload analyzer endpoints exist and are functional. Frontend components are properly implemented.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Intermittent 520 errors during AI analysis calls
flaky_endpoints.impact: Some AI analysis requests fail with load balancer timeout

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 500 instead of 400 for connection errors, causing 520 responses
flaky_endpoints.impact: Error handling could be more graceful for invalid connections

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 500 instead of 400 for connection errors, causing 520 responses
flaky_endpoints.impact: Error handling could be more graceful for invalid connections

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 500 instead of 400 for connection errors, causing 520 responses
flaky_endpoints.impact: Error handling could be more graceful for invalid connections

passed_tests: API /api/ returns correct v2.1.0 Robust Edition version info
NEW: Database tables introspection endpoint exists (/api/db/tables)
NEW: Query table validation endpoint exists (/api/query/validate-tables)
MongoDB collections for incremental storage are accessible
Landing page loads correctly with SQL X-RAY branding
Authentication flow works (redirects to Google Auth properly)
Frontend components DatabaseScannerPanel and WorkloadAnalyzerPanel are implemented
Database connection test endpoint works correctly
Workload analyzer successfully processes phases (query_digest, slow_queries, table_io, index_usage, recommendations)
Scanner engine handles MySQL connection errors gracefully with retry logic
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider improving error handling in new v2.1.0 endpoints to return 400 Bad Request instead of 500 Internal Server Error for connection failures. This will prevent load balancer 520 errors and provide better user experience.

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all components load correctly, authentication flow works, new v2.1.0 components are implemented)
